name: Zhenna Thomas
text: I love the option of building your own pizza with unlimited toppings. You‚Äôre pizza is ready in just a few short minutes and is always hot fresh and tasty. I find it better to order in person as I have not had the best experience with ‚Ä¶More

name: Malachi Girmann
text: Went to pickup a order. And the staff asked me to call in next time due to my inability to wear a mask. I called the next time and when the employee was asked why he needed to bring the delivery to curbside the manager started cussing me out I overheard her on the phone saying ‚Äúthen why is he even delivering‚Äù very poor representation.

name: Lucas Hatchel
text: I've never seen so many workers in one space with so little to have to do and still be as rude as these people were. Clearly not adhering to current rules about masks on customers. There was an entire group of people 2 feet away from me and ‚Ä¶More

name: john cole
text: The website said 20-25 minutes. It was clearly ready before I got there right at the 20 minute mark. On top of that it was warm at best not hot. It tasted good but I don't plan on ordering here again.

name: Kathryn Friedlund
text: Awesome!! Staff changed gloves and put pizza on a designated gluten free mat for celiac. Delicious!!! Love the sea salt and oregano on top too. Affordable fast and delicious!

name: Alyssa Marsh
text: I'm actually not a fan of thin crust pizza..or atleast I thought I wasn't. My husband and I are in love with this pizza. The staff and owners are very friendly and love recommending toppings (which I love). ‚Ä¶More

name: Angie Bailey
text: Blaze is my favorite go to for gluten free (friendly) pizza crust.  I am not sure what happened today at this location,  but it wasn't the same taste or texture.

name: Kenya Jackson
text: Great experience every time. I build a different pizza each time I dine with them. I love the seasonal veggies and the outside seating area: ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Jefferson
text: From the moment  you enter this restaurant  they give you a nice feeling. Very hospitable hosts, it is a lovely place to hang out with your friends or with your date. very good  cuisine, skillful  chief cook and stuff, honest  price and professional  service. Highly recommended.

name: Coop Beast33
text: super fast and delicious food, everyone is nice and socially safe! 10/10 recommended.

name: Shelia Huntley
text: This was my 1st time eating here. I loved my Pizza.  Everything  is So Fresh  and  All the Employees  are  so  Friendly.  To me I would  give them 10 Stars!! Keep  up  the  excellent  work!!

name: Larry Tryonoviech
text: Pizza is very good. Need a bigger selection  of beer. A good experience. The staff was very friendly and efficient

name: Lisa Parker
text: I love Blaze Pizza!  Nothing like a custom thin crust pizza made fast!

name: Gabriella Rose
text: Hey Blaze! Girl you have done it again... constantly raising the bar for Us all and doing it flawlessly. I‚Äôd say I‚Äôm surprised but I know who you are.ive seen it up close and personal. Blazes you make me so proud, and I love you.

name: John Forbes
text: Love the set up, and the garlic knots sre the best I've ever had anywhere.

name: Lynne Porter
text: Favorite place for pizza and the build your own toppings make it so easy for our family to each get what they like on their individual pizza! Impressed by the politeness of the staff and manager. Keeps us coming back!

name: Linda Carter
text: Awesome pizza and salads as well as some great choices for drinks! The staff is super friendly and helpful. I highly recommend!

name: Sarah Wilson
text:
Loved it! Great find during our visit to Asheville. It's the subway of pizzas. Pick your toppings, add as little or as much as you want!üçï Then they fire it!üî•
$8.95 Good deal!

name: Ryan Cameron
text: Super fast service even thought the line was to the door! Pizza was delicious and a great portion size, I could barely finish it. Pizza is not cheap, about $8-10 a person, but it was worth it. I will definitely come back. Cool atmosphere and very inviting. Great place!

name: Fred De Stefano
text: Fantastic.  Prices for a personal pizza are great.  Many sauces to choose from as I can not have tomatoe sauce anymore.  Crusts are low on choosing as I have a problem with my jaw.

name: Steven Carter
text: This establishment is amazing... lives up to its promise of fast, delicious pizza nearly every time I go!  You can tell some of the employees who are still here after a couple years really love working here.  Topping selection is great.  Very happy to give this restaurant my money.

name: Grace
text: We like blaze a lot because of the price and how good the pizza here. But today my husband came home with 3 pizzas with different toppings. On mine which is the white sauce had a hair (yuck) at first I thought it was cheese string. The hair is even stuck in the dough. Won't eat pizza here anymore.

name: Will Mittelsteadt
text: We were visiting the Biltmore Estate up the road and ordered via the link in Google maps. By the time we got out of the estate and drove down, our AMAZING applewood bacon pizza (the Whitetop) was ready and they brought it out to our car! Fired pizza crust is soooo Mich better!

name: Sarah Richards
text: Always great service. The entrance can be crowded, but you get served very quickly. And of course the pizza is just amazing. Whether you build your own, or order one of their signature pizzas.

name: Allan Pack
text: If your looking for an amazing environment and absolutely outstanding service go see my friends Joe, Sierra, & Cesar at Blaze Pizza. Hands down one of the best places in Asheville to eat.

name: Cedric Payne
text: Blaze Pizza is a great family-friendly restaurant where everyone can have their personal pizza exactly how they want it. You can order one of their specialty pizzas or build your own. You can add all of the high quality sauces, cheeses, ‚Ä¶More

name: Trent Harvey
text: Great pizza great service!

name: Amber Scheel
text: My all time favorite place to get pizza, create your own, pick you toppings, fresh dough, fresh ingredients. Atmosphere is amazing. Highly recommended.

name: Ttyme All Day
text: I had a gift card that has not been used and they wouldn‚Äôt accept it and yes it had money on it and I asked for a BBQ chicken pizza which is on the menu and asked for no peppers or onions and they left out everything so the pizza was very bland! Bad review all around.

name: Izabela Borlee
text: Wonderful food, I would have given it 5 stars but I didn't appreciate one employee shaking his braided hair all over my pizza!  Ps: I did ask the cashier if he should have his hair tied up she said "I don't know, I am only a employee"... I ‚Ä¶More

name: Lesslie Carleton
text: Build your own pizza with many fresh toppings and sauces to choose from! So good! Best pizza in Asheville!

name: Kristie Strieby
text: Great pizza.... We made our own.. delicious choices, affordable, superb customer service!!

name: Brian Payne
text: Food was good but the staff were rude and service was poor. I ordered online and 30 minutes later received notification that the food was ready for pickup. Upon arrival it took almost 5 minutes just to get someone to speak to me and tell me ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Wellington
text: Service was terrible. They burnt my pizza and when I asked to speak to a manager they told me they would go get their manager Cesar but never came back out so I walked out and left. Never coming back and I hope this alters your decision too.

name: Kristina Smith
text: Long lines for Pi day but still efficient and accurate service.  I got a build your own Pizza with spicy red sauce.  Yum!! Their lemonade and blood orange lemonade were also delicious.  It was worth driving from Tennessee in the flurries.

name: Mary Plemmons
text: BBQ chicken pizza was good but next time I'll ask for more chicken.  Love the thin crust

name: ANTHONY LITTLE
text: Awesome place that you can enjoyed good pizza..a lot of vegan choices. Keto and build your own pizza highly recommended you are going to love it.

name: D D
text: Had birthday party here. Great staff. Wonderful food.

name: Jeff Brown
text: Great keto pizza option.

name: Mario
text: It's one of the best pizzas in town. Much better and cheaper than all souls.

name: Crissy Cortez
text: It was delicious! The kids loved picking their own toppings and seeing their pizza cooking. And they tried their cookies and brownies as well. The staff was friendly and helpful. Plenty of different toppings and sauces also they have salads ‚Ä¶More

name: Raymond B
text: Blaze Pizza is definitely one of my favorite Pizza places. I love to build my own pizza. Clean and nice customer service.

name: Kevin Smith
text: Had to ask for the drizzle, had to tell them the dough had a hole in it before topping, and it's burnt.  Not the greatest show today.

name: Omar
text: Yes, their pizza is mediocre, but the one star is purely because they rang up my order wrong, supposedly refunded, then re-rang me for the correct order, but I never got the refund. Just two $30 charges on my account, awesome!

name: Cheondra Thompson
text: First timer. Fresh, fresh ingredients. Fun to make your own pizza. Fast and friendly service.

name: myrna godfrey
text: So many options from dough  to sauces to meats to veggies to cheeses. Really LOVE the fresh mozzarella & veggies! Also cookies & brownies.

name: Angela LaRowe
text: Great pizza at a great price!

name: Flo Klein
text:
This is at the Tunnel Rd location

text: Good quick and easy pizza, made while you wait. Fun, inexpensive.

name: Stephanie Rosser
text: Great food, terrible service. I always feel like the workers here are rude and annoyed. It makes me not want to come to this location. I wish management would talk to their employees about being more customer friendly. Love the pizza but just wish it was more welcoming.

name: Brad Swaffer
text: Friendly service, fantastic pizza, affordable prices. AND if you come during a fundraiser, a portion of the proceeds from your meal goes to support local charities!

name: Angela Oliver
text: Fantastic pizza ... grateful that they have choices such as gluten free dough & vegan cheese!! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Good choices

Design your own piizza..ready in 10 minutes.

text: Have never had been to a Blaze Pizza before. It is a step better than Pizza Hut, Domino's, Papa John's and Marcos. The best pizza I've ever had.

name: Benji Thompson
text: This is the best pizza I have ever eaten. It is very reasonable an quick.

name: Kristina Castaldo
text: Great pizza. I have never had complaints about the food. Everyone was very nice, there was no wait at all. But PLEASE SELL THE BLOOD ORANGE LEMONADE IN A GALLON LOL.

text: Love the self rising make it yourself pizza!

name: Georgia Mason

text: Loved this place. We went in to get a quick lunch, pizza was great, staff was very helpful. They have plenty of choices to select from for the topping, food comes out fast and it's well done. There is plenty of parking in the back by the mall side.

name: Jose T. Matute
text: This is an amazing pizzeria is delicious, something unique, you can build your own pizza with unlimited toppings , and a good price.  you need to try it! üòã

name: Jarrod Evans
text: We have eaten here 7 or 8 times now now and it is REALLY good Pizza.  Good location near plenty of shops, really clean place to eat and staff are super friendly .  Love that the pizza is fresh, fast and at a good price.  Worth a few extra $$$ ahead of some of the chain pizzas around for sure.

name: Buggy Pops
text: Best gluten free crust I‚Äôve ever had.

name: shannon lafferty
text: Great food, we got named after the peanut gang.  Affordable prices great taste and great view from outside. I would go here again and I highly recommend it. Place was very clean and had good customer service.  -Woodstock

name: Van Goes

text: Amazing pizza and fast service.

name: David Muntean

name: Jeremy Atkins

text: This is a great pizza place. I like it a lot because you can add as many topping as you want and as much topping as you want and it‚Äôs still the same price. I never feel like I‚Äôm getting skimped on any topping for that reason. Every one of ‚Ä¶More

text: Helpful employees serving create your own pizza.

name: The Bee Man Jay
text: It was great to make your own pizza. Everyone was very nice and helpful. Great experience our frist time there.

name: Donovan williams
text: Blaze is always amazing! Where else can you build your own pizza and add as much cheese as you want without the price going up!!?? Wood fired pizza at it's best!

name: Mae Eng
text: Postmasters had to refund us because YOU wouldn't pick up a phone. An hour and a half for nothing. Thanks! Apparently you can advertise with delivery services that will refund you on good faith (because at least they are legit), just to ‚Ä¶More

name: Dominic Galloway
text: Workers were super nice and pizza was cooked better than the blaze pizza near my house in sc.. Highly recommended after a hike.

name: Ashley Burns
text: The sauces, cheeses, toppings taste great however I've eaten here 4x and the dough itself is never cooked enough. Instead of being crispy it's flops and if u order a lot of toppings w oil it tastes soggy. I don't mind waiting a bit longer ‚Ä¶More

name: David Pendleton
text: Great place to build a pizza anyway you want it, or pick from one of their specialty pizzas.They have vegan options also. The staff was friendly and helpful. My pizza was great. If you are debating to try it or try something else.  Just go to Blaze you won't be disappointed.

name: Katie Sollenberger
text: The pizza and salad were great and a great price! My only regret was going when it was so busy; I would've liked more time to consider all of the ingredients. Listing them on your board (even with a "all items subject to availability") ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg Bowers
text: Good atmosphere clean facility quality ingredients only negative there large pizza is the size of a Pizza Hut medium. But taste a lot better.

name: nancy herrera
text: Not a pizza lover but just because its blaze I am! Recommended the build your own pizza. LITERALLY!  You can customize the pizza any way you want with as many toppings you like. (My preference 2 in 1 half and half) for the price of 1.

name: Barbara Rodriguez Gibbs
text: Usually fast. I love the thin personal pizza. Like $ 6.96 tax included

name: Robyn Ramsey
text: Great pizza, friendly staff. Great place.

name: jane miller
text: Pretty awesome, great gluten free pizza! The arugula salad is awesome. Try the two for two, a half pizza and a salad. Great for when you are going to the theater and don't want leftovers haul around. A thumbs up for me.

name: Tyler Edward
text: I really enjoy this place, its a build your own pizza place and it is delicious they use good cheese and excellent sauce and great dough. The staff is friendly the sodas are excellent. It's fast and greatly priced. Worth a try!

name: Jennifer Anderson
text: Build your own 11 inch pizza for 8.99! All the toppings you want! Can't beat it!

name: DARRELL FENDER
text: Build Your Own can't beat that üëç

name: Shelley H
text: Fantastic pizza...the exact way you want it. Quick service too!

name: Timothy Holland
text: Neat build-your-own pizza style. Very good quality ingredients and fast cooking times. We eat here often.

name: Hunter Esterline
text: Super thin and crispy crust. Not greasy! Delicious!

name: Paula Ray
text: My family and I came here to eat today! It was so good! Alex took our orders today and was so nice and explained everything! He also made our pizzas and they were so pretty! Krystal rung us up and cut our pizzas. She was very nice when giving our kids their pizzas! Would definitely recommend, and it's a great option for vegetarians!

name: Bailee Thompson
text: Amazing service! Gluten free options! Really food pizza. Couldn't be happier.

name: David Gross
text: Blaze pizza has more non pizza options, but fewer topping options than Mod. The crust was not my favorite and was a little under cooked and floppy for a fire baked pizza for my liking. As stated pizza came out with light and floppy crust ‚Ä¶More

name: Jordyn Gardner
text: I always enjoy my time at Blaze. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Their gluten free crust is phenominal and they'll even change gloves and use fresh sauce scoops so it lessens the chance of cross contamination. The pizza topping are always fresh and the atmosphere is inviting!

name: Christopher Vann
text: Pure Simplistic Awesomeness! Great experience! I was sitting down eating my custom made pizza, in less than ten minutes from the time I placed my order. I would recommend everyone try Blaze Pizza! Very affordable, no coupon needed!

name: Elizabeth Hartle
text: Boise is my absolute favorite pizza place. you get your own personal Pizza that fills you up I need to get as many toppings as you want without extra charge. Within reason

name: Joshua Anderson
text: Great place to grab a personal pizza. They have no preservatives in the meat choices and the pizza is always great. Awesome staff and well worth the drop by if you're in this neck of the woods.

name: Walela Lu
text:
Difficult to find! No sign on building which faces Tunnel Rd, but entrance in back.  Google Maps  directs to Old Haw Creek Rd,  but sign reads Peak Center Rd.
Courteous, professional (adhered to Celiac safety protocols), and efficient ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg
text: Great place to grab a bite! They include all of the ingredients you could want on a pizza, including gluten free and vegan options. Very quick assembly line style, everything was labeled well and there were plenty of staff to accommodate the large line that was forming. I would definitely return

name: Devin Dzioba
text: Great food, fresh and fast, doesn't hurt the wallet

name: Herbert Pomfrey
text: After reading the reviews here, I'm left wondering where these people ate. Blaze on Tunnel Rd. does not serve good pizza. Crust not done,crust is paper thin, garlic knots have way too much oil, order was all mixed up with 3 other orders. We ‚Ä¶More

name: April DeBord
text: Fun build your own pizza with great fresh salads.

name: Michelle Connelly
text: Blaze is my go-to favorite pizza! I always get the Build your Own pizza.  I love that it is my pizza and no sharing required! This fire roasted pizza is the best!

name: Josh Payne
text: Blaze Pizza is a make your own pizza restaurant that is very good. The build your own pizza has many choices for toppings from meats to vegetables. The pizzas cook quickly and the line moves well. There is plenty of seating and the service ‚Ä¶More

name: Jonathan Taylor
text: This place is really great. It's like the Moe's of pizza joints. Personal pizza wood fired right in front of you. Quick too.

name: Sue Miller
text: Awesome service, great food, great price

name: Sara Cain
text: Great place for a friendly get together. Great food and good prices. A large variety

name: K K
text: 5 star for dairy allergies and vegans! Glove change, cook on paper, even used different sauce in case the regular was contaminated. The food and service were spot on. Inside was super clean, spotless bathrooms, too.

name: CJ Velte
text: By far my favorite pizza restaurant in asheville. It's like subway but with pizza. Menu is simple and I can put whatever I want on it and say how much of it I want. I always go here if friends or family are in town because they have great, whole pizzas at reasonable prices. Would highly recommend.

name: Heather Wines
text: Love how fast they make a great pizza! There's so many topping choices, something for everyone in the group.

name: Marti Skelly
text: The gluten free crust is the best! I do wish they would put the salad pizzas back in the menu but everything they have is delicious!

name: Sheena Pilcher
text: Great food...fresh food. Friendly staff. And amazing environmental. Affordable

name: Thomas Miller
text: Great pizza with all the toppings you want at a low price and fast.

name: Brian Danielian
text: Very good! Great place for a quick meal. The pizza is very good and the staff is great.

name: Fresh Pickle
text: Fairly cheap and great food. The pizzas are fully customizable and it is a great place for families.

name: Mark Konzen
text: Aside from having to request more of virtually every ingredient or topping, the pizza itself is good.

name: John Calhoun
text: Good stuff, awesome drink selection.

text: There's always wonderful workers and good quality food! üôåüèΩ

text: A great place for customized pizzas. You build your own from a bunch of topping options, all of which are healthier than the toppings at most places (check their website on the quality of their topings). I recommend giving them a try!

name: Donna Sebren
text: Good pizza.  I prefer the thick dough.

name: Chris Hamm

name: Anthony Carlucci
text: Top notch chain,been to one in Santa Barbara,very good thin crust made too order,reasonable price,good size allowed take home,also good service

name: Trey Singleton
text: I was very surprised!  Would go back...hard working staff that was actually engaged.  Plus they have vegan cheese

name: Bread Prez41
text: Really good pizza, poses competition to the pizza place a normal go to. The lemonade was good, too. The only thing that was meh was the brownie but even that was alright. I'll be back soon, for sure.

name: Gavin Rouse
text: this place has some amazing pizza. it's cheap and fast and I enjoy the music they play it's just a little loud sometimes. but overall great place.

name: Esther Rodriguez
text: A GREAT place to eat good pizza, fast! The staff is very accomadating and pleasant. They have a Vegan cheese option that is excellent. The price is right for families and those on a budget, but no skimping on taste and quality!

name: Michael Cass
text: OMG!! It was 1030pm and we were hungry as heck. The greatest place to eat in Asheville. Customer service was the best I've ever had. Food was delicious and I will rate this place a 10. Thanks guys for having us.

name: Marcella Truitt
text: Great food. Great staff! Adam taking the orders and helping in the line was extremely friendly and made sure each customer got exactly what they wanted and was smiling with everyone. Their vegan alternative is delicious! Also they are very ‚Ä¶More

name: Landon Williams
text: Pizza is very tasty. Serving size is just right, as are the prices. Only complaint is that the music is a little too loud.

name: Leslie Arriola
text: Great pizza at an amazing price!! So glad my friend recommended it to me!!! Get to choose your own toppings for cheaper then Pizza hut, Dominos and papa johns!! Plus it's made right in front of you and fire oven baked!!

name: Tom Jones Jones
text: Build your own pizza, what's not to like about that!

name: John Van Meter
text: What a great place. You tell them what you want and they fix it in just 5 minutes or so! The pizza is unbelievably good!

name: Danielle W.
text: Great pizza and fast too. Customize your own or get one of their great creations. The 1/2 and 1/2 option is great for when your want a side or appetizer.

name: J D
text: Pizza prepared how you want when you want.  Many tasty toppings and sauces to choose from.  Get an extra one to-go, I did.

name: Marissa Faith
text: Rude workers, unpleasant experience.

name: Matt Kam
text: I had a HORRIBLE experience at Blaze pizza in Gerber village. We had a buy one get one pizza coupon. Manager would not honor it. Refused, He said it was a mistake that corporate sent out and couldn't be honored. (Because that makes sense). ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh S.
text: Always quick, fresh, delicious & inexpensive!  They don't up-charge for extra cheese like some of their competitors & they have a plethora of topping selections.  They warm up their cookies in the front of the big wood fired baking oven & ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Clark
text: Love this pizza! It's like the Subway of pizza. You can make your own or pick one of the pre-set items. And they are delicious...freshly made, thin crust with anything you want. Very reasonably priced, delicious leftovers, and Blue Sky soda! Yum!

name: aubrey.
text: I really recommend this place! They have really good food and if they mess something up they always fix their mistake!

name: Dawn Fieler
text: We had family in town, and our son suggested we eat here over burgers. He said it was delicious pizza and "you build it like a sub sandwich". Good description,  and all seven of us absolutely loved our pizzas. Highly recommend this restaurant. I also had a small salad, the arugula salad, delicious too.

name: Andrew Casper
text: I just had pizza and garlic rolls. OMG üòç. Best I've had since I was in NY.

name: Tina Redman
text: Pick you toppings and build your own pizza. There are plenty of items to choose from. Favorite drink blood orange lemonade.

name: Grant Hearing
text: Service was Fantastic! Everyone working there is very friendly and helpful! The "Build your own Pizza" for $7.85 is the way to go. I got 9 different toppings, and the pizza was Awesome! I had leftovers too! Definitely a 5 start experience! You have got to give them a try!

name: Kristi Sanborn Miller
text: I have 4 kids, and we all enjoyed having our own pizza. I can't stop thinking about the crust- so crispy and chewy. Kids loved endless blue sky soda. Definitely want to return.

name: Bill Volz
text: Fairly decent pizza considering that you can get any toppings all for the same price. Try adding some gorgonzola cheese or a mix of pesto and classic red sauces.  And the boxes for left overs fit 1/2 a pizza. Wife likes their brownies too.

name: Jen J
text: This place is so awesome!!!! It's like a pizza subway.  Anything you want in your pizza for one set price is perfect!! It's so delicious as leftovers the next day!!!! Good job Blaze pizza!!!!

name: Annie Bee
text: This place is always on top of it and one time they messed up my pizza but realized before they even served it to me and they gave me the other one for free as well :) and the staff is very nice

name: LS Grillo
text: OMG.  I love blaze pizza. Custom made just the way you like..Yumüî•

name: James Tucker
text: Good price and you can build your own

name: Jamie Beck
text: My kids love getting to create their own pizza.  There are sooo many delicious toppings to choose from!!

name: Paul Lewis
text: Good pizza made quickly. I especially liked the build your own option with the amazing selection of toppings and cheeses.

name: Christie Brookshire
text: I usually go out for lunch 1 or 2 times a week, and this is ALWAYS a place I choose. You can't beat a better lunch for the price. The toppings are always fresh, the line moves fast and the staff are always smiling and friendly! Joe even has ‚Ä¶More

name: Sultry Summers
text: Pizza was good, as was service. Prices was about $10.00 to $15.00 above Blaze in Knoxville.

name: Wesley Sims
text: Love that you can put so many toppings on your pizza. All the toppings are fresh and high quality. I really appreciate that there are multiple options for crust.  They're are doing a great job during the Covid19 pandemic.

name: Raven Smith
text: Blaze is the subway of pizza. You can buy a build your own and the sky is the limit there. Their drink selection is amazing and they have the best agua frescas. Visit please!

name: Beth
text: Great pizza and great price

name: Juan Parra
text: Great pizza at an amazing price. The atmosphere is great and the staff are all really friendly. Would recommend to anyone looking for a quick bite and quality pizza!

name: My Dad
text: Great place to eat.   Very friendly,  great drink selection,  pizza Always great,  make it exactly like hot want it.   Great value.   Had kids birthday party there

name: Jordan Bazzle
text: Super easy to place a pickup order and the point of sale process is brilliant. Pay with card on phone, walk in, get pizza. No congested lines and fast friendly service. ‚Ä¶More

name: Lyn Martin
text: Best pizza place. You pick your crust and all the toppings you want then it is cooked in a fire oven. Love this place. They even have gluten free crust.

name: Melissa Briggs
text: Great vegan options, super fast service, good quality.

name: Mary Gallagher
text: BEST PIZZA IN ASHEVILLE

name: Britt Taylor
text: Friggin awesome.

name: Rebecca D. Edwards
text: This was my first time!  I had barbecue chicken pizza very good!

name: Ashley Gunter
text: I've only ate here once an it was okay but may e I'd like it better after the next visit...

name: James Hughes
text: This is my favorite pizza place in town. There pizza is so good and the workers are extremely  courteous. I will definitely go back there again and again.

name: Michaelia Brown
text: We love love Blaze and are addicted!! You get to personalize your pizza with all your favorite toppings AND it's fire cooked and delicious. What could be better?

name: gary lamb
text: Kid friendly. Very good crust. I like the all veggie pizza.

text: Great fast pizza. Take one of their signature pies or build your own.  The build your own is $7.95 and that includes all the toppings you would like.

text: Blaze pizza amongst the other similar chains is ok overall. The prices are reasonable but the selection of types of crusts and toppings is nothing compared  to it's competitors. They have gluten free crusts but the others have cauliflower crust which is more amazing.

name: Molly H.
text: Always a great meal! It gets busy around lunch and dinner time, but waiting to order your food is the longest wait. The pizza doesn't take long to bake at all and it's so worth it. The smores pie is a favorite of mine, they'll heat it up by the fire so its nice and gooey once you're ready to eat it.

name: ken getz
text: I've always enjoyed this place.  Now that I've been diagnosed with ciliacs disease i appreciate it even more. They did a glove change, swapped out the brush for the pesto garlic sauce. I've felt very weird at other restaurants while trying to be gluten free and here they made me feel very comfortable! Love this place!

name: Danielle Quina
text: Love making my own pizzas full of amazing ingredients!

text: Just ate at Blaze Pizza for the first time.  I had a cheese pizza and a Buffalo chicken salad.  The salad was sub par.  The lettuce was wilted and there were very few pieces of chicken.  The pizza was not the best I have had, but will do in a pinch.   I don't think I would return and would not recommend it to anyone else.

text: What's not to love? It's cheap, it's fast, it's easy, and it's delicious. I love the build your own for a fixed price. You can really experiment since it's all a flat rate. Portions are a bit bigger than one person would normally eat.

text:
I have strong opinions about pizza and while not the best pizza in the area, Blaze is a good option if you're in the area and need something in a hurry.
One caveat though, if it's late and they aren't busy the oven seems to get too hot, scorching the crust in the time it takes to cook the toppings.

text: Neat place. Very fast service from start to finish. Good choice of toppings. Pleased to see vegan cheese. We are vegan and asked for double on the veggies since they were adding them sparingly. text: We love this place.  They have so many great toppings like goat cheese, roasted garlic, roasted butternut squash, sauted onions just to name a few.  All the classic toppings as well.  My husband and I can eat here for under $20.

Be sure to get dessert if you dine in, ooey gooey warm sugary goodness!
